casebody.data:
[Civ. No. 4988. First Appellate District, Division One. October 22, 1924.] DANIEL O’NEIL, Appellant, v. FRANK C. SYKES et al., Respondents.

Sloss, Ackerman & Bradley for Appellant.

George Lull, City Attorney, and Maurice T. Pooling, Jr., Assistant City Attorney, for Respondents. ...

*798TYLER, P. J.

The question involved in this case is in all respects similar to that in Hurley v. Sykes et ad., ante, p. 310 [231 Pac. 748]. Upon the authority of that case it is ordered that the judgment be reversed and that a decree be entered in favor of appellant, with the direction that the writ issue.

Knight, J., and St. Sure, J., concurred.
